main event: A couple observed a grey elongated object moving rapidly in Winston-Salem, North Carolina on 26 Sept 68.
interesting points: The object changed from stationary to moving rapidly to the northeast,The size of the object was compared to a dime held at arm's length,At one point the object appeared to be spinning and emitted a sort of exhaust,The witness has been observing UFOs at night for the past year,Another witness noted a bright light that illuminated the area and seemed too big to be a star or planet.
sighted object: an elongated grey object and a bright light
witness description: a couple who observed the UFO together
